name: Cathode Ray Tube VR
description:
Play videos on a glitchy tv in a rainy attic. Supports currently h.264 format.

Starring: Adeyemi Francis as host of introduction video

CONTROLS

- Trigger/Interact - Replay Intro Video

- Grip button - Open videos folder

- Joypad right/left - Next/Previous video

Video compatibility

- H.264 supported. Other formats might not work. Works best on videos that are downloaded from streaming services using a downloader.

This has proven to be the best method to get movies:
https://www.reddit.com/r/answers/comments/9qop1v/which_is_the_best_free_youtube_...
